coffee_shop.name: Coffee Shop
coffee_shop.description: Casual daytime setting perfect for relaxed conversations
coffee_shop.background_description: A cozy coffee shop with ambient music, the smell of fresh coffee, and people working on laptops or chatting quietly
social_norms: Keep voices at conversational level
It's normal to work alone or chat with friends
Casual dress and behavior expected
People often approach others they know
conversation_starters: Commenting on the coffee, food, or atmosphere
Asking about what someone is working on (if they look approachable)
Casual observations about the music, crowd, or setup
Complimenting someone's drink choice or asking for recommendations

house_party.name: House Party
house_party.description: Social gathering with music, drinks, and groups of people mingling
house_party.background_description: A lively house party with music playing, people in small groups chatting, some dancing, drinks available
social_norms: Louder conversation is normal due to music
People expect to meet new people
More casual, playful behavior is accepted
Groups are often open to new people joining
conversation_starters: Asking how someone knows the host
Commenting on the music, drinks, or party setup
Complimenting someone's outfit or style
Asking what someone does or where they're from

networking_event.name: Professional Networking
networking_event.description: Business networking event with professionals looking to make connections
networking_event.background_description: A professional networking event in a nice venue, people in business attire, name tags, light refreshments
social_norms: Professional but friendly demeanor expected
People expect to discuss work and career goals
Business card exchanges are common
Conversations tend to be purposeful but still social
conversation_starters: Asking what someone does for work
Discussing industry trends or challenges
Asking about career journey or background
Commenting on the event or speakers

gym.name: Gym
gym.description: Fitness center where people work out and might chat between sets
gym.background_description: A modern gym with equipment, mirrors, energetic music, people focused on workouts but open to brief chats
social_norms: Keep conversations brief unless someone is clearly taking a break
Fitness and health topics are natural conversation starters
People are sweaty and focused - keep it casual
Asking for workout tips or spotting is common
conversation_starters: Asking for advice on exercises or equipment
Complimenting someone's form or dedication
Commenting on music or gym facilities
Asking about workout routines or fitness goals

bookstore.name: Bookstore
bookstore.description: Quiet, intellectual atmosphere perfect for thoughtful conversations
bookstore.background_description: A cozy bookstore with shelves full of books, reading nooks, soft lighting, and quiet browsing
social_norms: Keep voices low and respectful
Literary and intellectual topics are welcome
People expect thoughtful, genuine conversations
Browsing quietly is respected
conversation_starters: Asking for book recommendations
Commenting on books someone is looking at
Discussing authors, genres, or recent reads
Asking about book clubs or literary events

park.name: Park
park.description: Outdoor setting with people walking, exercising, or relaxing
park.background_description: A pleasant park with walking paths, benches, trees, people jogging, walking dogs, or having picnics
social_norms: Very casual and friendly atmosphere
People are often open to brief, friendly chats
Dog walkers and joggers might pause for conversation
Nature and outdoor activities are natural topics
conversation_starters: Complimenting someone's dog
Commenting on the weather or scenery
Asking about running routes or park amenities
Casual observations about nature or activities

time_pressure.name: Time Pressure
time_pressure.description: You only have 5 minutes to make a good impression
time_pressure.effect: Conversation will end after 5 minutes automatically

group_setting.name: Group Conversation
group_setting.description: Join a conversation that's already happening
group_setting.effect: Multiple characters will be present and talking

challenging_mood.name: Challenging Mood
challenging_mood.description: The character is having a difficult day
challenging_mood.effect: Character starts in a negative or distracted mood

specific_goal.name: Specific Goal
specific_goal.description: You have a specific objective to accomplish
specific_goal.effect: Must achieve a goal like getting contact info or making plans

get_contact_info.name: Make a Connection
get_contact_info.description: Have a natural conversation that leads to exchanging contact information
success_criteria: Find common ground or shared interests
Make the contact exchange feel natural, not forced

make_plans.name: Make Plans
make_plans.description: Suggest and agree on a future activity together
success_criteria: Propose a specific plan that appeals to both of you
Get enthusiastic agreement for the plan

learn_something_personal.name: Personal Connection
learn_something_personal.description: Learn something meaningful about the person through good conversation
success_criteria: Listen actively and show genuine interest
Get them to share something personal or meaningful

make_them_laugh.name: Bring Joy
make_them_laugh.description: Use humor appropriately to make them genuinely laugh or smile
success_criteria: Read their mood and sense of humor
Use appropriate humor for the situation
Get a genuine laugh or big smile

handle_disagreement.name: Navigate Disagreement
handle_disagreement.description: Disagree respectfully while maintaining good rapport
success_criteria: Listen to their perspective with openness
